schema.description: 要更新的泛在入网凭证的ID。
自定义入网凭证名称，用于更新旧名称。
class A的接收窗口延时，单位为ms。

Success.description:
是否调用成功。
- **true**：调用成功。
- **false**：调用失败。

RequestId.description: 请求ID，阿里云为该请求生成的唯一标识符。

400.errorMessage: User not authorized to operate on the specified resource, or this API does not support RAM.
This operation cannot be performed because of security risks.
The specified resource does not exist.
The Link WAN service has not been activated.
The feature has not been activated.
The request processing has failed due to some unknown error, exception or failure.
The specified join permission has already been bound to another node group.
The specified join permission name already exists.

title: 更新当前用户账号所申请的泛在入网凭证
summary: 更新当前用户账号所申请的泛在入网凭证。
description:
## QPS限制
单个阿里云账号调用该接口的每秒请求数（QPS）最大限制为5。

> RAM用户共享阿里云账号配额。
